overview: Produced over a 9-year period, and divided into 9 chapters, PERSPECTIVE is an episodic drama that spans 9 consecutive years in the turbulent romantic lives of a married couple and their best friend, each of whom is named “Alex”. Mysteriously, the 3 lead actors not only swap each other’s role from chapter to chapter, but sometimes within the same chapter.
tagline: A complex love triangle involving three characters each named "Alex".
title: Perspective
